prompts: Create a playful water-type Pokemon that has a cute seal-like appearance and a vibrant blue color.
I want a whimsical Pokemon that can use water attacks and has a charming personality.
Generate a friendly aquatic creature with a round body and a signature pink nose.
Make a unique Pokemon that thrives in the sea with a blue and white color palette.
Imagine a starter Pokemon that evolves into a majestic sea creature with a clown-like aesthetic.
Design a Pokemon with distinct aquatic features and a clownish flair, perfect for a playful environment.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies joy and water, with a colorful appearance and playful nature.
